layout.name: spawningBehaviour
layout.title: Spawning Behaviour
layout.tooltip: Decides how the NPC's spawning behaves.

layout.name: invincibleTo
layout.title: Invincible To
layout.tooltip: Decides what the NPC is invincible to.

layout.name: noblockcollision
layout.title: No Block Collision
layout.tooltip: If true, the NPC will go through blocks.

children.name: exclusiveSpawn
children.title: Exclusive Spawn
children.tooltip: If true, the generator will not spawn another NPC until the one it generated dies or despawns.
